Package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance

This package contains the objects that facilitate the maintainer's interaction with the vending machine.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessManager
    This control object manages and controls entry to the system by the Maintainer.
    ButtonItem
    This boundary object displays one item in a ButtonItemDisplay..
    ButtonItemDisplay
    This boundary object is to display stock information when a button is pressed.
    CoinDisplay
    This interface object is part of the Maintenance Panel. It is used by the Maintainer to display the total number of Coins of each denomination that are currently held in the CashStore. The object contains buttons to represent (and select) the Coin denominations used in the vending machine.
    CoinDisplayListener
    This control object monitors the events in the CoinDisplay and performs actions in response to the buttons being pressed.
    DrinkDisplay
    This interface object is part of the MaintenancePanel. It is used by the Maintainer to display the total number of cans of each DrinksBrand that are currently held in the DrinksStore. This object contains buttons which represent (and to select) the DrinksBrand served by the vending machine.
    DrinkDisplayListener
    This control object monitors the events in the DrinkDisplay and performs actions in response to the buttons being pressed.
    ExitButtonListener
    This control object monitors the Exit Button and performs actions in response to the button being pressed.
    MaintenanceController
    This control object handles the system maintenance use case.
    MaintenancePanel
    This panel simulates the vending machines maintainer control panel. It will enable the user (the Maintainer) to:
    1- Log-on using a password;
    2- Display number of Coins of each denomination in the CashStore;
    3- Display total value of cash in the system;
    4- Display total number of cans of each DrinksBrand held in the DrinsStore;
    5- Change the price of any DrinksBrand;
    6- Collect all cash held in they system;
    7- Formally exit from the panel.
    Password
    This entity object stores the correct password.
    PasswordListener
    This control object monitors the events in the Password Box and performs actions in response to data being entered into the text field.
    PriceDisplayListener
    This control object monitors the events in the Price Display and performs actions in response to data being entered into the text field.
    TotalCashButtonListener
    This control object monitors the Total Cash Button on the MaintenancePanel and informs the MaintenanceController when it is pressed.
    TransferCashButtonListener
    This control object monitors the Transfer Cssh Button and performs the required action in response to the button being pressed.

Package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance Description

This package contains the objects that facilitate the maintainer's interaction with the vending machine.
